ygData.subject: Re: Malice & Blacknightmare
ygData.msgSnippet: Malice:  Th male holds the crying Blacknightmare close to him, trying to console her.  I will not leave you, not for anything. BlackNightmare: the femme

 Malice:  Th male holds the crying Blacknightmare close to him, 
trying to console her.  "I will not leave you, not for anything."
BlackNightmare: the femme huged him, her sobs was fading  and she 
was camling
Malice:  He remains quiet, just holding her close and comfortinmg 
her emotions.
Blacknightmare: "I promise to work to repair what I have done... and 
bring your memories back"
Malice:  "But let's at least wait for Hellplague to wake up, okay?  
Let's just wait."
BlackNightmare: "YEs"said teh femme while her sadness slowly 
erased "We should wait... But, now you're in danger... we're in abig 
danger...Unicron'll track us... or he's doing right now.... We have 
to think what will we do next"  
Malice:  "We'll manage, I won't let him hurt you."  Th Hunter pulled 
her close and kissed her gently.
Blacknightmare: "You're in more danger.... I have that feeling"said 
worried the femme"You have more chances to come back to Maximals and 
that will be dangerous for Unicron and we, we has less chance that 
any faction here receive us... "
Malice:  He put a finger to her lips.  "Let's not worry about that 
now.  Just worry about you and me, at this moment."
Blacknightmare: The femme touched glenty his hand and retired it, 
and she moved her face towards' Malice and Kissed him.
Malice:  The Hunter returned and deepened the kiss, as if it meant 
life or death.
Blacknightmare: The femme toucehd glenty his chin without broke the 
kiss
Malice:  He reached up and caressed her cheek with the back of his 
fingers, to spare her his claws.  He held her close, wanting her 
body heat to ignite into a fire around him, with all the revelations 
she made to him, he felt cold.
BlackNightmare: The femme broked the kiss and said "You're tembling, 
do you have cold?"
Malice:  "I don't know, I just feel really cold, like my life is 
being forced out of me."
Blacknightmare:   "I took alot of your life, but all will be return 
to ya"
Malice:  "Don't say anything like that!  Just don't say it!" he 
said, tears beginning to well in the corners of his optics.
BlackNightmare: the femme kindly wiped the tears and said "What're 
hurting ya?"
Malice:  "You're talking like you are a monster, like you hurt 
people all the time.  But I know that's not true!  I know it!  Just 
quit talking about yourself that way."
BlackNightmare: "Do you have any idea how many alive planets have I 
help to destroy?"said sadly the femme
Malice:  "I don't care about that!  I just care about you, not what 
you've done."
BlackNightmare: the femme rested her head in his chest , she didn't 
commented anything alse and tried to calm down. She had to do it  in 
order to Malice could calm to and he didn't sufered more
Malice:  He queited down, sitting on the floor and holding 
Blacknightmare to him, relishing the warmth between them.
BlackNightmare: the femme was phisicaly and mentaly tired, soon she 
felt sleep
Malice:  "I don't care about that!  I just care about you, not what 
you've done."
BlackNightmare: the femme rested her head in his chest , she didn't 
commented anything alse and tried to calm down. She had to do it  in 
order to Malice could calm to and he didn't sufered more
Malice:  He queited down, sitting on the floor and holding 
Blacknightmare to him, relishing the warmth between them.
BlackNightmare: the femme was phisicaly and mentaly tired, soon she 
felt sleep
Malice:  Gently picks her up and keeps the blanket around them and 
walks back into th storage room and laies back down with her and 
covers her up and he too, gets ready to go to sleep.
BlackNightmare: Blacknightmare moved but she didn't woke up
Malice:  He smiles again, happy a little bit and snuggles close to 
the femme and drifts to sleep.
